elevator_pitch.one_line: Nexus automates repetitive workflows for non-technical teams using AI that learns how your team actually works.
elevator_pitch.problem: Non-technical teams (HR, operations, sales ops, customer success) spend 40% of their time on repetitive tasks: data entry, status updates, report generation, cross-tool copying. Existing automation tools require technical expertise or rigid templates that break when processes change.
elevator_pitch.solution: Nexus uses ML to observe how teams work, then suggests and implements automations without requiring coding or rigid setup. The AI learns your team's patterns and adapts when workflows change.
differentiation: No-code setup - non-technical users can implement automations in minutes
Adaptive learning - AI adjusts when processes change, doesn't break like Zapier
Context-aware - understands team workflows holistically, not just individual task automation
Built for operations teams - designed for HR, sales ops, customer success, not just engineers
elevator_pitch.target_customer: Mid-market companies (50-500 employees), operations teams drowning in repetitive work, buying champions are typically ops managers or directors

features: Workflow observation - connects to team's tools (Slack, Notion, Airtable, Salesforce, etc.), observes patterns
Automation suggestions - AI identifies repetitive tasks, suggests automations
One-click implementation - non-technical users approve suggested automations without coding
Basic analytics - tracks time saved, automations running, team adoption
v1.0_launched_sept_2023.tech_stack: Python backend (FastAPI), React frontend, PostgreSQL + Redis, AWS deployment
v1.0_launched_sept_2023.architecture: Microservices, event-driven, built for scale by Sarah
v1.0_launched_sept_2023.performance: handles 10k automation runs per day currently, architected for 1M+
v1.0_launched_sept_2023.customer_feedback: love the concept, want it faster and more accurate, occasionally suggests irrelevant automations

major_improvements: 3x faster ML inference - re-architected pipeline, rebuilt from ground up
Better accuracy - new models trained on 18 months of customer data, 40% fewer irrelevant suggestions
Real-time sync - changes propagate across tools instantly instead of 5-minute delay
Improved UI - complete redesign based on user feedback, cleaner and more intuitive
Team collaboration features - shared automation libraries, approval workflows for managers
